verses.name: Genesis 21:6
verses.text: And Sarah said, God hath made me to laugh, so that all that hear will laugh with me.

verses.name: Genesis 21:7
verses.text: And she said, Who would have said unto Abraham, that Sarah should have given children suck? for I have born him a son in his old age.

verses.name: Genesis 21:8
verses.text: And the child grew, and was weaned: and Abraham made a great feast the same day that Isaac was weaned.

verses.name: Genesis 21:9
verses.text: And Sarah saw the son of Hagar the Egyptian, which she had born unto Abraham, mocking.
